title: How To Create a Dessert Station
description: http://blog.bedbathandbeyond.com/ Wow your guests with a fun and memorable dessert station.

asset.title: How To Create a Dessert Station
asset.description: http://blog.bedbathandbeyond.com/ Wow your guests with a fun and memorable dessert station.
asset.author: Bedbathandbeyond

transcripts: Hi, I'm Julie from Bed Bath & Beyond. Want to really wow your guests at your next party? Why not set up a fabulous dessert table? It's important to consider the location of your dessert table. You wanted to be where the guests are relaxing towards the end of the night and easy to access. A folding table with a tablecloth is easy to set up anywhere. Desserts are by Nature a little fun and Fabulous, you can definitely get creative with table decor. Have fun with how you display your desserts; it's all about the serving pieces Mix them up Berry Heights colors and styles and remember to designate a serving utensil for each dessert too. Think about what kind of treats you want to offer guests, something chocolate, something warm, a fruit dessert, holiday cookies, seasonal candy. Abundance in color put it all over the top. For easier serving, pre cut desserts into small pieces, part of the fun is getting to sample as many as you like. Put your most decadent dessert on a pedestal in the center of your table for a while Factor. Use these tips for a festive dessert Buffet at your next party. It's a perfect way to end your event on a sweet note.
